dt: {bc}a sweet flavored usually creamy mixture used to coat baked goods (such as cupcakes)
{bc}something that adds to the interest, value, or appeal of an item or event
often used in the phrase {it}icing on the cake{/it}

shortdef: a sweet flavored usually creamy mixture used to coat baked goods (such as cupcakes) —called also frosting
something that adds to the interest, value, or appeal of an item or event —often used in the phrase icing on the cake

dt: {bc}an illegal act by an ice hockey player of shooting a puck from within the defensive zone or defensive half of the rink beyond the opponents' goal line but not into the goal

shortdef: an illegal act by an ice hockey player of shooting a puck from within the defensive zone or defensive half of the rink beyond the opponents' goal line but not into the goal

dt: {bc}to coat with or convert into ice
{bc}to cover with or as if with icing

dt.t: made two free throws … to {wi}ice{/wi} the win

dt: {bc}to shoot (an ice hockey puck) the length of the rink and beyond the opponents' goal line

shortdef: to coat with or convert into ice

dt: {bc}something extra that makes a good thing even better

dt.t: The concert itself was great, and getting to meet the band afterward was (the) {it}icing on the cake{/it}.

shortdef: something extra that makes a good thing even better

dt: {bc}sugar that has been ground into a fine powder

shortdef: sugar that has been ground into a fine powder

dt: {bc}serving to prevent the accumulation of ice

dt.t: The suit alleges that the aircraft's operators … failed to properly use {wi}anti-icing{/wi} equipment.

shortdef: serving to prevent the accumulation of ice

dt: {bc}a type of {d_link|icing|icing:1} composed of sugar, egg whites, and sometimes flavoring or coloring that dries to a hard glaze and is used for decorating baked goods

dt.t: {wi}Royal icing{/wi}, made primarily of sifted confectioners' sugar and egg whites or meringue powder … dries hard with a glossy sheen, making it ideal for decorating cutout cookies.
To make cookies look like buttons, use frosting of choice (such as {wi}royal icing{/wi} or icing in a tube) to pipe four small dots onto the peanut butter cups.

shortdef: a type of icing composed of sugar, egg whites, and sometimes flavoring or coloring that dries to a hard glaze and is used for decorating baked goods
